# Scripts

Bundled resources for database-deadlock-detector skill

- [x] analyze_deadlocks.py: Script to connect to the database, run deadlock detection queries, and format the results.
- [x] simulate_deadlock.py: Script to simulate a deadlock scenario for testing purposes.
- [x] resolve_deadlock.py: Script to automatically kill the blocking process in a deadlock (use with extreme caution).
